title: Is there any way I can get the updated client now?
body: I didn't download it and now I can't find it, could anyone provide me a link?

replies.body: The option to update your client shoudl be available through the patcher.  There should be an option to download the open beta on the top right.  Let me know if that helps clear things up!
yep, I found It, thanks for the help!
